There are two editions of this book; one with examples in the R
programming language [^R-lang], and another with examples in the Python language

This is the {{< var lang >}} edition.

is published.

We wrote this book in
[RMarkdown](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) with
[Quarto](https://quarto.org). It is automatically rebuilt
from
[source](https://github.com/resampling-stats/resampling-with) by
[Github ](http://github.com)
